mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from t_base_company
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.insert:
insert into T_BASE_COMPANY (ID, PARENT_ID, PROJECT_ID, INDUSTRY, SUB_INDUSTRY, COMPANY_CODE, COMPANY_SAP_CODE, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_FULL_NAME, COMPANY_TYPE, BUSINESS_SCOP, TAX_CERT, ORGANZATION_CERT, BUSINESS_LICENCE, COUNTRY, PROVINCE, CITY, ADDRESS, MOBILEPHONE, TELEPHONE, FAX, EMAIL, WEBSITE, REMARK, CONTACTS, STATUS, IS_ENABLE, EXTERNAL_MANUFACTURER, PURCHASING_STAFF, GROUP_CODE, DELEGATE_TYPE, BUSINESS_TYPE, INDUSTRIAL_TYPE, RECONCILIATION_ACCOUNT_CODE, RECONCILIATION_ACCOUNT_NAME, PAY_CONDITIONS_CODE, PAY_CONDITIONS_DESC, ORDER_CURREN, INTERNATIONAL_TRADE_CONDITION, SALESMAN, SALESMAN_PHONE, INVOICE_VERIFY, AUTOMATIC_PURCHASE_ORDER, PURCHASING_GROUP, PLANNED_DELIVERY_TIME, SUPPLY_PROPERTIES, INDUSTRY_CODE, INDUSTRY_DESC, CREATE_TIME ) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.subIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companySapCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.businessScop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.taxCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.organzationCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.businessLicence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.externalManufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.purchasingStaff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.delegateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.industrialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reconciliationAccountCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reconciliationAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.payConditionsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.payConditionsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderCurren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.internationalTradeCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.salesman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.salesmanPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.invoiceVerify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.automaticPurchaseOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.purchasingGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.plannedDeliveryTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supplyProperties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.industryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.industryDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
